name: Mac's Match the Hatch Fly Fishing Video Game
blurb: Come fly fishing! Earn points and catch the big daddies to unlock all four rivers/levels. Match the hatch in increase your chances.

rewards.reward: Sofa Pillow: You get a shout out in the credits for support. Thank you!!!

Orange Stimulator: The finished game in all of its glory. The game features four levels based on actual rivers for you to fish. As you explore, you gather clues as to what is hatching and select a fly to use.  As a special bonus, you will also receive one extra fly with better odds for hooking  fish during hatches. Have fun and tight lines!

Parachute Adams: You get the game with all its secrets unlocked. I'd tell you more but it's a secret. Shhh, don't tell anyone. As an extra bonus, you get three special flies for use in game. These flies have better odds and special powers for catching fish in game.

Woolly Bugger: You get a special dirty dozen flies to use in game. These improved flies have better odds of catching fish over the standard set included in the planned release of the game. Special flies have abilities like attracting fish from longer distances and with more aggressive takes. Orange Stimulator included.
Hare's Ear: Video included with the game that explains different types of casts, basic techniques and how to release fish unharmed. Woolly Bugger and Parachute Adams included.

Green Butt Skunk: Virtual taxidermy. Send me a high resolution picture of you holding your fish, and I will send you back a DVD of the fish as a 3D model. I will also will include a rendered movie of your virtual fish rising for a fly. If your virtual fish is big and bad enough, I will add it to the game. Woolly Bugger and Parachute Adams included.
Silver Doctor: You get five special, decorative, blue ribbon steelhead flies hand tied by me, mounted in a frame with original artwork. Signed. Woolly Bugger and Parachute Adams included.

Undertaker: Every fisherman has the story of the one that got away. You get to name a Big Daddy fish in the game! You must catch these fish or earn enough points to unlock the next level. Too bad "George" will never know what hooked him. Woolly Bugger, Parachute Adams and The Silver Doctor included.

Skykomish Sunrise: We spend a day fishing, choosing from one of my favorite places to go. You can pick my brain about in game and out of game fly fishing, while we cast a fly or two around. Woolly Bugger, Parachute Adams and The Silver Doctor included.

General Practitioner: Let's go fishing! Plus you get a golden fly and rod that will always catch fish, no matter what is hatching in the game. I will choose a nice place to fish and we can talk sponsorship. Woolly Bugger, Parachute Adams, The Silver Doctor and Skykomish Sunrise included.

Green Highlander: You get your very own level that I will construct just for you. Choose your favorite trout spot in the whole world and I will make a model of it for you to fish in game. You and you alone. Fish it, sell it or just love it. It is all up to you. You whale, me Ahab - let's talk.
